So, you’ve been daydreaming about refreshing your living space. You might have a few exciting decorating ideas, but there’s just one thing: you don’t live alone. How do you make everyone in your household feel happy and comfortable while focusing on style? Here are a few tips to help you create a fabulous living space that works for everyone.
CLICK TO SEE HOMECHOICE’S HOMEWARE BY ROOM
If you have roommates
It’s a good idea to chat to your roommates before you start buying things to change your shared space. You never know what they might have a big problem with until you’ve checked with them. Discuss your style ideas with each other, and you’re guaranteed to work out a look that suits everyone. If you get your roommates excited about redecorating, they might even help you with the tricky bits that you can’t do alone.
If you realise you just can’t agree on the main living space, rather focus on improving a different space – one your roommates are happy for you to transform without their input. Perhaps it’s your patio, entryway or bedroom. A new bedding set with matching curtains can completely change the way you feel about your home. Accessorise with a luxurious blanket and add scatter cushions to make it extra cosy.

CLICK TO SEE HOMECHOICE’S WIDE RANGE OF BEDDING SETS
If you’re renting
Before you start knocking nails into walls, be sure that the owner is happy with the sort of changes you have in mind. If he/she isn’t, think of the problem as a creative challenge to get the look you want without breaking the rules.
For example, if you want to paint the walls and find out you’re not allowed to, a lounge suite or curtains in a single colour can add the same WOW factor (and hide dirty marks just as well).
CLICK TO SEE HOMECHOICE’S LOUNGE CURTAINS & FURNITURE
